channel.title: Hosting Server?
channel.description:
i dont really play runescape any more but hey, its summer why not? well yea. i used to own a server name monstarscape.servegame.com was pretty popular i guess. 45+ most on at one time:]
i was wondering if there is a way i can run it on a web site i should say? i would b the one paying the web hosting. and was thinking if that is possbile and if it is. i mite do it.
btw. im doing it cause it would b on 24/7
